favourite.article: Qué dulce melodía que nos introduce en una atmósfera divina para alabar a Dios en espíritu.
Amen. This hymn usher me to love our Lord Jesus Christ more.

I like this song because it is so sweet. It shows how sweet and understanding the humanity of Jesus is. It also recalibrated my heart to place Jesus first today. My heart is attrached to Him and wants to give my vessel to Him. A humble surrender.
